metadata.title: CVE-2016-4425 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Jansson 2.7 and earlier allows context-dependent attackers to cause adenial of service (deep recursion, stack consumption, and crash) viacrafted JSON data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjansson4 - 2.5-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jansson package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5-2ubuntu0.1').
